name: guozhi-efficiency-platform
description: ```bash (root) +- src                     # Groovy 源码文件 |   +- com |       +- guoguo |           +- Bar.groovy  # for org.foo.Bar class +- vars |   +- foo.groovy          #  全局'foo'变量 |   +- foo.txt             # 'foo' 变量的帮助文档 +- resources               # 资源文件 (external libraries only) |   +- org |       +- foo |           +- bar.json    # static helper data for org.foo.Bar ```
